Package sample

Class Company

java.lang.Object
sample.Company
public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
Array-based container class that implements the employee database; the array will store al ist of employees, which may include the isntances of full-time, part-time and management. The initial capacity is 4 and grows by 4 everytime the array is filled.
Author:
David Okechukwu, Sajan Thornhill
